page.title: 16BUILDING AN OIL RIG
page.content:
My dads name is{David Soley}he is 37 years old and managing director of a firm called{Davy Offshore Modules. Their factory is in{Middlesbrough. They build parts of deep sea oil rigs. These rigs get oil from under the sea,the oil comes up a big pipe and is stored in a tanker.An oil rig weighs about{60,000 tons}and is{500 metres high and{200 metres square.}My dad doesn't actually make the rig he works in an office and instructs the workmen on which part of the rig to build and how to fix the parts together.Another firm comes and checks to see that it is built properly and that there are no cracks in the welding.Our class is going to visit the works and see the modules being built.
{BY CHRISTOPHER SOLEY AGED 10
